attributes.action:
Legally protect the NHS from privatisation.
(plus FREE parking for staff).
attributes.additional_details: Because you work for the tax-paying public, not the tax-dodging offshore shareholder.
attributes.background:
Solemnly pledge that the UK's National Health Service will NEVER be privatised - and write the same into LAW so that future governments may not rescind.
Link NHS workers' wages to inflation so that they ALL may live with dignity and without debt. 
Parking on NHS grounds MUST be FREE for NHS staff.

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign these petitions calling for the same action:
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/300019
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/307909
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/300073
